title: The Amazing Johnathan: Wrong on Every Level
original_title: The Amazing Johnathan: Wrong on Every Level
overview: Part comedian, part madman magician The Amazing Johnathan brings his unique brand of comedy to DVD in The Amazing Johnathan: Wrong On Every Level – Uncensored. This all-new Comedy Central special showcases "The Madman of Comedy" at his best, hilariously skewering one magic trick after another with unexpected and sometimes gory results.
